info.title: RiiBootMii
info.author: SudoTronics
info.description: A Plugin that reboots your Wii U
info.details: RiibootMii provides two fast ways to reboot your Wii U: hold the button combo (default: L + R + Y + D-Pad Down) (configurable from the config menu), or select “Reboot now” in the plugin’s config menu and press A.
